title: Sippy Softswitch Technical Support Standard Plan (for internal use only)
description:
Sippy Softswitch Technical Support Standard Plan

INCLUDED - service provided within the Plan
ORDER - service can be ordered for additional fee, please contact Sippy
NOT INCLUDED - service is not provided within the Plan, please consider purchasing Professional or Enterprise Plan
Main Terms ValueDescription and Examples
Max number of tickets per month5Maximum number of task related tickets during the month. Questions do not count.
Base supported server capacity limit, CC2,000For any additional 1,000CC 2% is added to base support price 2%
Maximum number of licences/servers1Standard Plan is limited to one licence/server. Please contact Sippy Sales for customized plan.
Number of supported environments limit per Plan 1The limit of environments additional to the root environment allowed within the plan. Please contact sales to discuss possible customized plan.
Maximum number of customer agents in Sippy Helpdesk3The maximum number of customers contacts that can be registered in the Sippy's Helpdesk. 
Communication meansSippy HelpdeskAll requests to Sippy have to be placed via helpdesk system by the following link: https://support.sippysoft.com or by email support@sippysoft.com
Expected first response time and setting priority for the ticket10 minutes“Response time” is defined as the amount of time between when the client first creates an incident report and when the provider actually responds (automated responses don’t count) and lets the client know they’ve currently working on it.

First response will include the Priority Classification of the task as defined by Sippy engineer which will reflect on when the Sippy support start implementing the task and how frequently the customer will be informed about the implementation process.
Technical Support ServicesPlan coverageDescription and Examples
Two-week onboarding team chatIncludedAssistance via the live chat (ryver messaging system) for a newly provisioned clients. Within 2 weeks period, Sippy's best experts helps with understanding of SippySoft switch and assisting in configuration steps.
Free one-hour training within onboarding chatIncludedTraining session means a live call/meeting with a customer (via skype, hangouts) when the onboarding chat isn't efficient and some presentation/demo is needed.
ProvisioningIncludedInstallation of SippySoft switch, installation of ordered modules. 
SSP update licenceIncludedUpdate of code, OS, postgresql is included to the standard support agreement, but limited by the number of supported versions. E.g. if your Sippy version is lower than 3 releases prior to the latest one, Sippy wouldn't support it for free.
SSP update workIncludedWork related to updating the SippySoft switch code, database and OS to the latest available version.
Repartitioning of cdrsIncludedRequires in case of high volume traffic (more than 2000CC) to offload partitions by the number of stored CDRs in each. May be necessary if there is a "slow web interface" issue is detected.
IVR issues investigationIncludedSippy support may help to extract the details for the call that was done via Calling Card/Callback application. And check the reason of the issue with IVR application.
Other system log investigationIncludedSippy support may help to investigate all other logs on a Sippy switch side except sip logs that may be extracted via the web interface via Sip Log Viewer feature.
Softswitch web config questionIncludedSippy support may instruct a switch operator how to configure some call scenario in the SippySoft switch, but all actions on customer's production systems may be done only by a switch operator.
Sippy instructs on the config questions etc. only in case it is not covered in the documentation and video tutorials.
Dedicated support engineerNot IncludedDedicated support - a particular senior engineer(s) who follows your company, coordinates support related activities, provides online consultations, regular meetings, etc. The requirements to the engineer and related terms and conditions shall be agreed with each customer individually. Available only for Professional and/or Enterprise.
Weekly review calls Not IncludedRegular or on demand weekly meetings with a Dedicated Support Engineer to discuss necessary issues related to switch operations and technological developments needed (available only in a premium plan).
Server administrationNot IncludedSippy's support doesn't manage the hardware and network issues on client's servers (dedicated solution)
Additional Online training or advisory sessions ORDERIf the 1st free training has been provided, customer may request an additional training that may be ordered on a fee basis in the sales department.
Operational Improvement Team ChatORDERContinuous team chat in Ryver with the Sippy's key professionals to discuss technical, organisational and possible other issues related to the oprations improvement of the customer business.
System MigrationORDERMigration of a data or licence to a new hardware. Old server should be decommissioned and data should be removed accordingly.
Database MigrationORDERMigration of an archived database or dump to some external resource once.
Setup script to copy Database to the FTP serverORDERMigration of an archived database or dump to some external resource on periodical basis.
CDR restorationORDERRestoration of CDRs that were missed on the web interface. Restoration may be done from the sip.log file that system keeps stored on server (maximum 10 days/logs).
SIP Log investigation by supportORDERInvestigation of a sip call via the Sip Logs Viewer on the web interface.
Audit log investigation by support staffORDERAudit log feature helps to track web changes.
Swap IPs (network relocation)ORDERAny extra requests regarding the network changes should be ordered in a Sippy sales department. E.g. replace old IP's by new. Swap IP's between servers.
Softswitch server configuration workORDERAny custom configuration on the backend of server may be performed only in case if it is considered as a possible by support team and only in case if it was ordered by customer in the Sippy's sales department.
Replace HDD with a new one and Moving DB/logs to the new partitionORDERWhen customer needs to replace HDD by the new one on any production server.
Manual backup of databaseORDERDump database from command line manually on demand basis. This is an extra task that may be done only after confirmation from Sipp sales department.
SippySoft switch reinstallORDERIf customer wants to reinstall Sippy licence from scratch due to some HW issues or by HW replacement.
Restoring the cdrs from archives or archive cdrs featureORDERTo avoid archivation of CDR's that may require a further restoration, a switch operator may set the period of keeping data stored in the database and on the web, Otherwise the restoration of data from archive may be considered as an extra task for Sippy support and has to be ordered in the Sipp sales department.
Min downtime upgradeORDERUpdate with a minimal downtime may be considered if a hot/warm standby solution is configured
Urgent tickets (system outage or malfunctioning). Investigation/diagnostic fee + resolution fee.ORDERAn option that allows client to order some urgent investigation of some non-critical issue that may be considered by support team as a low priority task.
Maintenance ORDERDifferent types of maintenance that are not included in the list above
Professional Consulting ServicesPlan coverageDescription and Examples
Investigating and recommending hardware requirementsORDERInvestigation of hardware that was selected against Sippy's recommendations.
Investigating and recommending data center facilitiesORDERInvestigation of hardware issues of DC that was selected against Sippy's recommendations.
Developing custom made scenario and  related system configurationORDERDeveloping a complicated workarounds for the unavailable functionality.
Migrating client and other data from other switches to Sippy switchORDERMoving necessary data from other systems to Sippy Softswitch 
Optimizing softswitch servers infrastructureORDERDiagnoziz of the customer's system and professional advice on how the system can be optimized
Online consulting sessionORDEROne hour online session with Sippy consultants on any issue
Stress Testing of the SystemORDERTest of the servers in the conditions of pick traffic volume
